product.title: Flower Hair Tools Titanium 1.25" Rotating Styling Iron
product.product_id: Hair Tools Titanium 1.25" Rotating Styling Iron
product.description: STRAIGHTENS BETTER: So seriously, I kid you not. The rounded design of the revolving barrel actually straightens better than a flat iron! Plus, no creasing and crushing that can flatten hair. The ionic bristles and tourmaline ceramic plate polish your hair to reduce frizz and deliver unbelievable shine. MAXIMUM VERSATILITY: This glorious, rotating iron can add bombshell curls, or beachy waves with a flick of the wrist. Effortlessly add those voluminous curves by directing the rotating iron away from your face. And of course, just wrap your hair around the barrel and let it shine and polish your hair while it creates curls and waves that last for days. STYLES FASTER: The larger surface area of the 1.25” round barrel (versus a flat plate) actually straightens more hair with every pass. Styling our hair faster than we ever thought possible. The patented design also strengthens heat recovery, allowing the rotating iron to maintain a consistent high heat of 410°F for maximum speed and styling efficiency.
product.description_html:
STRAIGHTENS BETTER: So seriously, I kid you not. The rounded design of the revolving barrel actually straightens better than a flat iron! Plus, no creasing and crushing that can flatten hair. The ionic bristles and tourmaline ceramic plate polish your hair to reduce frizz and deliver unbelievable shine.

MAXIMUM VERSATILITY: This glorious, rotating iron can add bombshell curls, or beachy waves with a flick of the wrist. Effortlessly add those voluminous curves by directing the rotating iron away from your face. And of course, just wrap your hair around the barrel and let it shine and polish your hair while it creates curls and waves that last for days.

STYLES FASTER: The larger surface area of the 1.25” round barrel (versus a flat plate) actually straightens more hair with every pass. Styling our hair faster than we ever thought possible. The patented design also strengthens heat recovery, allowing the rotating iron to maintain a consistent high heat of 410°F for maximum speed and styling efficiency.
product.description_full:
STRAIGHTENS BETTER: So seriously, I kid you not. The rounded design of the revolving barrel actually straightens better than a flat iron! Plus, no creasing and crushing that can flatten hair. The ionic bristles and tourmaline ceramic plate polish your hair to reduce frizz and deliver unbelievable shine. MAXIMUM VERSATILITY: This glorious, rotating iron can add bombshell curls, or beachy waves with a flick of the wrist. Effortlessly add those voluminous curves by directing the rotating iron away from your face. And of course, just wrap your hair around the barrel and let it shine and polish your hair while it creates curls and waves that last for days. STYLES FASTER: The larger surface area of the 1.25” round barrel (versus a flat plate) actually straightens more hair with every pass. Styling our hair faster than we ever thought possible. The patented design also strengthens heat recovery, allowing the rotating iron to maintain a consistent high heat of 410°F for maximum speed and styling efficiency. * Straighten, Curl, Add Body & Shine
 * 1.25" Rotating Barrel
 * 1-Way Rotation
 * Ionic Bristles
 * 2 Heat Settings up to 410°F
 * 5.5’ Professional Swivel Cord
 * Automatic Shut Off For all hair types
product.description_full_html:
STRAIGHTENS BETTER: So seriously, I kid you not. The rounded design of the revolving barrel actually straightens better than a flat iron! Plus, no creasing and crushing that can flatten hair. The ionic bristles and tourmaline ceramic plate polish your hair to reduce frizz and deliver unbelievable shine. MAXIMUM VERSATILITY: This glorious, rotating iron can add bombshell curls, or beachy waves with a flick of the wrist. Effortlessly add those voluminous curves by directing the rotating iron away from your face. And of course, just wrap your hair around the barrel and let it shine and polish your hair while it creates curls and waves that last for days. STYLES FASTER: The larger surface area of the 1.25” round barrel (versus a flat plate) actually straightens more hair with every pass. Styling our hair faster than we ever thought possible. The patented design also strengthens heat recovery, allowing the rotating iron to maintain a consistent high heat of 410°F for maximum speed and styling efficiency.
  • Straighten, Curl, Add Body & Shine 
  • 1.25" Rotating Barrel 
  • 1-Way Rotation
  • Ionic Bristles
  • 2 Heat Settings up to 410°F
  • 5.5’ Professional Swivel Cord 
  • Automatic Shut Off For all hair types

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
